object.name: copyMessage
object.description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. Service messages and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz poll can be copied only if the value of the field correct_option_id is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method forwardMessage, but the copied message doesn't have a link to the original message. Returns the MessageId of the sent message on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. Service messages and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz poll can be copied only if the value of the field correct_option_id is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method forwardMessage, but the copied message doesn't have a link to the original message. Returns the MessageId of the sent message on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. Service messages and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz :class:`aiogram.methods.poll.Poll` can be copied only if the value of the field *correct_option_id* is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method :class:`aiogram.methods.forward_message.ForwardMessage`, but the copied message doesn't have a link to the original message. Returns the :class:`aiogram.types.message_id.MessageId` of the sent message on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent (or channel username in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: from_chat_id

annotations.description: Message identifier in the chat specified in from_chat_id
annotations.html_description: Message identifier in the chat specified in from_chat_id
annotations.rst_description: Message identifier in the chat specified in *from_chat_id*
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: New caption for media, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing. If not specified, the original caption is kept
annotations.html_description: New caption for media, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing. If not specified, the original caption is kept
annotations.rst_description: New caption for media, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing. If not specified, the original caption is kept
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the new caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the new caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the new caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the new caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the new caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the new caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.html_description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.rst_description: Sends the message `silently <https://telegram.org/blog/channels-2-0#silent-messages>`_. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.name: disable_notification

annotations.description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.html_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.rst_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.name: protect_content

annotations.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.html_description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.rst_description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
annotations.name: reply_to_message_id

annotations.description: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found
annotations.name: allow_sending_without_reply

annotations.type: InlineKeyboardMarkup or ReplyKeyboardMarkup or ReplyKeyboardRemove or ForceReply
annotations.description: Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard, custom reply keyboard, instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
annotations.html_description: Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard, custom reply keyboard, instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
annotations.rst_description: Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_, `custom reply keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#keyboards>`_, instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
annotations.name: reply_markup
